tool_contract.description: Generate FALCON cfg from pbcommand options.

pb_option.name: Genome length (base pairs) REQUIRED
pb_option.description: Approx. number of base pairs expected in the genome. We choose other settings automatically, based on this. (To learn what we generate, see fc_*.cfg, currently called 'falcon_ns.tasks.task_falcon0_build_rdb-PacBio.FileTypes.txt' amongst output files.)

falcon_ns.task_options.HGAP_GenomeLength.description: Approx. number of base pairs expected in the genome. We choose other settings automatically, based on this. (To learn what we generate, see fc_*.cfg, currently called 'falcon_ns.tasks.task_falcon0_build_rdb-PacBio.FileTypes.txt' amongst output files.)
falcon_ns.task_options.HGAP_GenomeLength.title: Genome length (base pairs) REQUIRED

pb_option.name: FALCON cfg overrides
pb_option.description: This is intended to allow support engineers to override the cfg which we will generate from other options. It is a semicolon-separated list of key=val pairs. Newlines are allowed but ignored. For more details on the available options, see https://github.com/PacificBiosciences/FALCON/wiki/Manual

falcon_ns.task_options.HGAP_FalconAdvanc.description: This is intended to allow support engineers to override the cfg which we will generate from other options. It is a semicolon-separated list of key=val pairs. Newlines are allowed but ignored. For more details on the available options, see https://github.com/PacificBiosciences/FALCON/wiki/Manual
falcon_ns.task_options.HGAP_FalconAdvanc.title: FALCON cfg overrides

tool_contract.name: Tool FalconConfigGenerator
